alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 8:33AM CST until February 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties. Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River near Chandlerville. * WHEN...From this evening to Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 456.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 457.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 456.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sangamon River Chandlerville 456.6 456.2 Wed 8 am CST 456.9 457.1 456.8 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
